page.topic: How to Add a Chart Control to a UX Component
page.description: The Chart Control can be used to create charts that display information, such as stock values or trend lines, in a UX Component.

description.p: The Chart control is useful for building dashboards with the UX Component. The Chart Control can be used to add several different types of charts to an app, including pie, donut, funnel, pyramid, stock, candlestick, bubble, box plot, scatter plot, and more.

Data series for charts are defined in the UX Component's *[ui:Data series]* property. One or more data series can be used when defining a chart. In addition, the look and feel of a Chart control can be customized.
